item.title: 👍Dwight Bickel - consumers
item.description: Dwight Bickel signed up to testify Pro. They are signed up to represent consumers.

item.title: 👎Curt Augustine - Alliance for Automotive Innovation
item.description: Curt Augustine signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Alliance for Automotive Innovation.

item.title: 👎💵Jeffrey Perry - General Motors
item.description: Jeffrey Perry signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent General Motors. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Nicolina Hernandez signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Toyota Motor North America.

item.title: ❓💵Noelani Derrickson - Tesla
item.description: Noelani Derrickson signed up to testify Other. They are signed up to represent Tesla. They are a registered lobbyist.

item.description: Alyssa Silhi signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Ford Motor Company.

item.description: Craig Orlan signed up to testify Con.

item.description: Matt Erwin signed up to testify Con. They are signed up to represent Mazda North American Operations.
